name: ArrowHead (vle)
description:
Controls:

  • A and D to move left and right
  • Space Bar to jump
  • Move Mouse left and right to aim
  • Hold Left Mouse Button to charge shot, release to fire
  • Pick up arrow by walking into it

(best played w/ mouse)

Shoot as many targets as possible before time runs out! You only get one arrow, so make sure not to lose track of it; it can get stuck in pesky jumping fruit or a rolling apple.

Made by Vuong, Jack, and James
